languages.text: {n}В до того тлевших странным огнем глазах друкари полыхает безудержное пламя безумия — то же, что наполняет взгляд Маражая в момент пресыщения чужой болью. Ксенос издает короткий, истеричный смешок.{/n} "Да... так, как тому и положено быть..."

{n}Marazhai's eyes, which previously smouldered with a strange fire, suddenly blaze with the rampant flame of madness — the same madness that took hold the moment he was sated with another's pain. He barks out a short, hysterical laugh.{/n} "Yes... Just as it should be..."
languages.original_text: {n}В до того тлевших странным огнем глазах друкари полыхает безудержное пламя безумия — то же, что наполняет взгляд Маражая в момент пресыщения чужой болью. Ксенос издает короткий, истеричный смешок.{/n} "Да... так, как тому и положено быть..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes, which previously smouldered with a strange fire, suddenly blaze with the rampant flame of madness — the same madness that took hold the moment he was sated with another's pain. He barks out a short, hysterical laugh.{/n} "Yes... Just as it should be..."

{n}Marazhai's eyes, which previously smouldered with a strange fire, suddenly blaze with the rampant flame of madness — the same madness that took hold the moment he was sated with another's pain. He barks out a short, hysterical laugh.{/n} "Yes... Just as it should be..."

{n}Marazhai's eyes, which previously smouldered with a strange fire, suddenly blaze with the rampant flame of madness — the same madness that took hold the moment he was sated with another's pain. He barks out a short, hysterical laugh.{/n} "Yes... Just as it should be..."

{n}Marazhai's eyes, which previously smouldered with a strange fire, suddenly blaze with the rampant flame of madness — the same madness that took hold the moment he was sated with another's pain. He barks out a short, hysterical laugh.{/n} "Yes... Just as it should be..."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的双眼中原本闷燃着古怪的火焰，此刻突然迸发出了疯狂的烈焰，与他饱饮他人痛苦时的疯狂别无二致。随后，他又发出了歇斯底里的短促笑声。{/n}“正是如此……正如一切该有的样子……”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes, which previously smouldered with a strange fire, suddenly blaze with the rampant flame of madness — the same madness that took hold the moment he was sated with another's pain. He barks out a short, hysterical laugh.{/n} "Yes... Just as it should be..."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的双眼中原本闷燃着古怪的火焰，此刻突然迸发出了疯狂的烈焰，与他饱饮他人痛苦时的疯狂别无二致。随后，他又发出了歇斯底里的短促笑声。{/n}“正是如此……正如一切该有的样子……”

languages.text: {n}それまで不思議な炎でくすぶっていたマラズハイの瞳は、突然、激しい狂気の炎で燃え上がる…それは、彼が他人の痛みを味わった時と同じ狂気だった。彼はククッとヒステリックな笑い声を上げた。{/n}「あぁ…そうこなくっちゃなぁ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes, which previously smouldered with a strange fire, suddenly blaze with the rampant flame of madness — the same madness that took hold the moment he was sated with another's pain. He barks out a short, hysterical laugh.{/n} "Yes... Just as it should be..."

traits.locale_text: {n}それまで不思議な炎でくすぶっていたマラズハイの瞳は、突然、激しい狂気の炎で燃え上がる…それは、彼が他人の痛みを味わった時と同じ狂気だった。彼はククッとヒステリックな笑い声を上げた。{/n}「あぁ…そうこなくっちゃなぁ…」

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Marazhai, que antes brillaban como brasas encendidas, de repente fulguran con la llama desbocada de la locura; la misma locura que se apoderó de él tan pronto se hubo saciado con el dolor ajeno. Prorrumpe en una breve carcajada histérica.{/n} «Sí... así es como debería ser...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes, which previously smouldered with a strange fire, suddenly blaze with the rampant flame of madness — the same madness that took hold the moment he was sated with another's pain. He barks out a short, hysterical laugh.{/n} "Yes... Just as it should be..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Marazhai, que antes brillaban como brasas encendidas, de repente fulguran con la llama desbocada de la locura; la misma locura que se apoderó de él tan pronto se hubo saciado con el dolor ajeno. Prorrumpe en una breve carcajada histérica.{/n} «Sí... así es como debería ser...».

languages.text: {n}Le regard de Marazhai, qui un instant plus tôt brûlait d'un feu étrange, s'embrase subitement à la flamme galopante de la folie pure, celle-là même qui l'avait déjà submergé lorsqu'il s'était repu de la souffrance d'autrui. Il lâche un bref rire hystérique.{/n} « Oui... Comme de juste... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes, which previously smouldered with a strange fire, suddenly blaze with the rampant flame of madness — the same madness that took hold the moment he was sated with another's pain. He barks out a short, hysterical laugh.{/n} "Yes... Just as it should be..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard de Marazhai, qui un instant plus tôt brûlait d'un feu étrange, s'embrase subitement à la flamme galopante de la folie pure, celle-là même qui l'avait déjà submergé lorsqu'il s'était repu de la souffrance d'autrui. Il lâche un bref rire hystérique.{/n} « Oui... Comme de juste... »

languages.text: {n}In Marazhais Augen, in denen zuvor schon ein sonderbares Feuer schwelte, flackert nun endgültig der schiere Wahnsinn auf – derselbe Wahnsinn, der ihn in dem Moment ereilte, als er vom Schmerz eines anderen erfüllt war. Er lacht abrupt hysterisch auf.{/n} "Ja ... Genau wie es sein sollte ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes, which previously smouldered with a strange fire, suddenly blaze with the rampant flame of madness — the same madness that took hold the moment he was sated with another's pain. He barks out a short, hysterical laugh.{/n} "Yes... Just as it should be..."

traits.locale_text: {n}In Marazhais Augen, in denen zuvor schon ein sonderbares Feuer schwelte, flackert nun endgültig der schiere Wahnsinn auf – derselbe Wahnsinn, der ihn in dem Moment ereilte, als er vom Schmerz eines anderen erfüllt war. Er lacht abrupt hysterisch auf.{/n} "Ja ... Genau wie es sein sollte ..."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın az önce tuhaf bir alevle kor gibi yanan gözlerinde aniden deliliğin coşkulu alevleri tutuşuyor. Başka birinin acılarıyla tatmin olduğu anda kök salan o aynı deliliği görüyorsun. Kısa, histerik bir kahkaha koparıyor.{/n} "Evet... Tam da olması gerektiği gibi..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes, which previously smouldered with a strange fire, suddenly blaze with the rampant flame of madness — the same madness that took hold the moment he was sated with another's pain. He barks out a short, hysterical laugh.{/n} "Yes... Just as it should be..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın az önce tuhaf bir alevle kor gibi yanan gözlerinde aniden deliliğin coşkulu alevleri tutuşuyor. Başka birinin acılarıyla tatmin olduğu anda kök salan o aynı deliliği görüyorsun. Kısa, histerik bir kahkaha koparıyor.{/n} "Evet... Tam da olması gerektiği gibi..."
